gw.api.financials

Class AbstractMutablePairedMoney

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.financials.AbstractMutablePairedMoney
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IMutableMoney, IPairedMoney

    public class AbstractMutablePairedMoney
extends java.lang.Object
implements IMutableMoney, IPairedMoney
    Base class for implementing a pair of money values that can be updated.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.math.BigDecimal calcSecondaryAmount(java.math.BigDecimal value)
      Calculates the secondary amount for the given amount. Returns null if there is no secondary amount.
      void setAmount(java.math.BigDecimal value)
      Sets the primary amount. If there is a secondary amount, and it implements {@link gw.api.financials.IMutableMoney}, converts the value into the currency of the secondary amount (using the exchange rate specified in {@link #getExchangeRate()}), and then sets this converted value on the secondary amount.
      CurrencyAmount toCurrencyAmount()
      Converts this IMoney into a CurrencyAmount. Returns null if this IMoney's Amount is null. Otherwise, returns a CurrencyAmount whose amount and currency are equal to this IMoney's.

      • Methods inherited from class gw.api.financials.IMutableMoney

        setAmount, toCurrencyAmount

      • Methods inherited from class gw.api.financials.IPairedMoney

        calcSecondaryAmount, toCurrencyAmount

      • Methods inherited from class gw.api.financials.IMoney

        toCurrencyAmount

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        CurrencyAmount toCurrencyAmount()

        void setAmount(java.math.BigDecimal value)
        Sets the primary amount. If there is a secondary amount, and it implements {@link gw.api.financials.IMutableMoney}, converts the value into the currency of the secondary amount (using the exchange rate specified in {@link #getExchangeRate()}), and then sets this converted value on the secondary amount.
